name: chicagotribune
text:
Former Illinois Gov. James R. Thompson died Friday night, according to Chicago police and his family. He was 84.

“It was very sudden,” said wife Jayne Thompson, her voice breaking. “I was told that his heart simply stopped.” https://t.co/0RFZLrNT6M
